[unknown-format: template/msgfmt]: The format `invalid` is not valid.
> 1 | num: {num,number,invalid}, date: {dt,date,invalid}, time: {dt,time,invalid}
    |      ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
[unknown-format: template/msgfmt]: The format `invalid` is not valid.
> 1 | num: {num,number,invalid}, date: {dt,date,invalid}, time: {dt,time,invalid}
    |                                  ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
[unknown-format: template/msgfmt]: The format `invalid` is not valid.
> 1 | num: {num,number,invalid}, date: {dt,date,invalid}, time: {dt,time,invalid}
    |                                                           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
